author: perezhilton
title: Here's Donald Trump's ALL CAPS Response To Court's Ruling On Muslim Ban

organizations.name: scotland hated donald trump first & best

text:
UGH! He is so annoying!
As we reported , on Thursday, the 9th Circuit Court of Appeals voted unanimously to DENY the reinstatement the Donald Trump 's Muslim ban.
Related: Scotland Hated Donald Trump First & Best!!! 
Within minutes, the President — in typical fashion — responded to the decision the best way he knew how…
With a crass message on Twitter !
Melania Trump 's man wrote: 
SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 9, 2017 

Get over it, dude! YOU LOST!!!!
[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: donald trump , melania trump , politik , twitter
